title: UP prof's research could make chemotherapy less painful
desc: A new compound could lessen the harm chemotherapy has on the body of cancer patients.

title: 'If Iran gets nuclear weapons...': JD Vance warns of regional nuke arms race, mentions Saudi Arabia
desc: US Vice President JD Vance stressed that President Donald Trump’s agenda prioritises reducing the threat of nuclear weapons worldwide and said the president has “no interest” in repeating mistakes made during the Iraq conflict in the early 2000s.

title: Europol operation: Tammy Caruana accused of €1m fraud
desc: Tammy Caruana, accused of defrauding 200 victims out of €1 million, faces charges after a Europol-led operation spanning Malta, the UK, and Ireland. Learn more about the case.

title: BI nabs 5 Chinese in separate operations for working sans visas
desc: A Chinese man who was allegedly found to have been working in the Philippines without a proper visa was apprehended in Zamboanga City, the Bureau of Immigration (BI) said on Wednesday.

title: Kwesi Pratt blasts Majority, Minority leaders over KIA renaming debate
desc: The Managing Editor of Insight newspaper, Kwesi Pratt Jnr, has launched a scathing attack on the leadership of both the Majority and Minority caucuses in Parliament, describing the ongoing debate over the renaming of Kotoka International Airport...
